original_title: Edith Carlmar - bedre enn sitt rykte
overview: Edith Carlmar (1911 â€“ 2003) was Norway's first female director and a prominent figure in Norwegian film history. She created some of Norway's biggest box-office successes of all time. Agnes Moxnes interviews a frank and honest Carlmar, who talks about her movies and the times they were made. This DVD was released in 2011 in conjunction with the 100-year anniversary of Edith Carlmar's birth.
title: Edith Carlmar - bedre enn sitt rykte
